<!-- Smart Community Resource Sharing Portal - Project Setup Instructions -->

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
	Full-stack web platform using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, and MongoDB

- [x] Scaffold the Project
	Created React frontend and Node.js backend structure

- [x] Customize the Project
	Implemented features: user auth, resource sharing, amenity booking, complaints, announcements, forum, admin dashboard, notifications

- [x] Install Required Extensions
	No additional extensions needed

- [x] Compile the Project
	Installed dependencies for both frontend and backend

- [x] Create and Run Task
	Set up tasks.json for concurrent frontend/backend development

- [x] Launch the Project
	Servers running: Backend on http://localhost:5000, Frontend on http://localhost:3000

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
	README.md created with complete project information and setup instructions
